headline: Delta and other airline stocks fall as an analyst sees 'short-term pain' ahead
summary: Airline stocks are in for some turbulence, according to global investment bank Jefferies (JEF).

raw.headline: Delta and other airline stocks fall as an analyst sees 'short-term pain' ahead
raw.summary: Airline stocks are in for some turbulence, according to global investment bank Jefferies (JEF).

headline: Jefferies downgrades airline stocks, UAL now the sole Buy rating
summary: Investing.com -- Jefferies downgraded multiple airline stocks on Tuesday, citing weaker consumer and corporate sentiment, slowing revenue growth, and increased macro uncertainty.

raw.headline: Jefferies downgrades airline stocks, UAL now the sole Buy rating
raw.summary: Investing.com -- Jefferies downgraded multiple airline stocks on Tuesday, citing weaker consumer and corporate sentiment, slowing revenue growth, and increased macro uncertainty.

headline: United to Hold Webcast of First-Quarter 2025 Financial Results
summary: United will hold a conference call to discuss first-quarter 2025 financial results on Wednesday, April 16 at 9:30 a.m. CT/10:30 a.m. ET.

raw.headline: United to Hold Webcast of First-Quarter 2025 Financial Results
raw.summary: United will hold a conference call to discuss first-quarter 2025 financial results on Wednesday, April 16 at 9:30 a.m. CT/10:30 a.m. ET.

headline: Southwest, Delta, American Catch Downgrades. Why Airline Stocks Are Getting Crushed.
summary: It was a turbulent and ultimately terrible first quarter for airline stocks. The second quarter may not be much better for the industry.

raw.headline: Southwest, Delta, American Catch Downgrades. Why Airline Stocks Are Getting Crushed.
raw.summary: It was a turbulent and ultimately terrible first quarter for airline stocks. The second quarter may not be much better for the industry.
